creator: SWEET.TV
descriptionHtml:
SWEET.TV is a streaming service that offers access to TV-channels, Ukrainian films, world-class movies, cartoons, and the best series.
🆓 Use for free first 7 days. Activate subscription on your TV, smartphone, computer, tablet or even Xbox 🔥
🖥 260+ TV channels in HD, Full HD and 4K.
🕹 Control TV broadcast: pause, rewind and watch recorded programs (up to 7 days)
🎬 10,000+ movies in subscription for free. The average IMDb rating is 7.6
🔥 Ukrainian and Hollywood exclusives are available free of charge within the subscription.
🍿 Best series from HBO, CBS, ShowTime, etc.
❌ No ads.
📱 Application interface is one of the most friendly and understandable in the Ukrainian market, it works even with a bad internet connection and on weak devices.
⬇️ Download movies to the app and watch offline.
🥇 SWEET.TV is the first Ukrainian service to sign direct contracts with Disney, Paramount, Universal, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Sony for Ukrainian territory, not for the CIS and Russian markets.
🎙 Unique agreements made it possible to create Ukrainian-language dubbing and voice acting for cult films within the framework of the “Hollywood in Ukrainian” project at our own expense. The library of films in exclusive dubbing from SWEET.TV includes: "The Lord of the Rings", "The Matrix", four films about Harry Potter, the franchise films "Mission: Impossible", cartoon "Madagascar", "Groundhog Day", "Beauty" and others.
🇺🇦 From each paid connection, SWEET.TV transfers 10 UAH to its own Ukrainian Film and Television Development Fund. These funds are used to shoot film projects by Ukrainian directors.
Download the app and enjoy watching!

title: SWEET.TV. 260+ TV channels and TOP movies

creator: SWEET.TV
descriptionHtml:
SWEET.TV is a Ukrainian streaming platform which provides access to TV channels and movies for the whole family.

🆓 First 7 days of the test period for 0 UAH 😍

📺 260+ national, film, premium, sports and other TV channels, including HD and 4K quality

🕹 It's possible to control TV broadcasts: pause, rewind and record TV programs for up to 7 days.

🎬 10,000+ films and TV series, including premieres, Ukrainian and Hollywood exclusives, without additional payments.

✨ Animation by Disney, Pixar, DreamWorks, etc. for children of all ages and the whole family.

❌ No ads in the cinema.

🖐 Up to 5 devices can be simultaneously connected to one subscription, including TVs, smartphones, tablets, laptops or Xbox.

🥇 SWEET.TV is the first Ukrainian streaming platform that has signed direct contracts with Disney, Paramount, Universal, Sony, etc. specifically for the territory of Ukraine, not for the CIS.

🎤An exclusive Ukrainian dubbing and voice-over for Hollywood films, which didn't have it before. Service makes it at its own expense in the “Hollywood in Ukrainian” project.

😍 Works wherever there is Internet. The application interface is one of the most friendly on the Ukrainian market.

🍩 Download the app and enjoy quality content on SWEET.TV

creator: SWEET.TV
descriptionHtml:
SWEET.TV is a streaming service that offers access to TV-channels, Ukrainian films, world-class movies, cartoons, and the best series.

🆓 Use for free first 7 days. Activate subscription on your TV, smartphone, computer, tablet or even Xbox 🔥

🖥 260+ TV channels include in HD and 4K.

🕹 Control TV broadcast: pause, rewind and watch recorded programs (up to 7 days).

🎬 10,000+ movies in subscription for free. The average IMDb rating is 7.6.

🔥 Ukrainian and Hollywood exclusives are available free of charge within the subscription.

🍿 Serials.

❌ No ads.

📱 Application interface is one of the most friendly and understandable in the Ukrainian market, it works even with a bad internet connection and on weak devices.

⬇️ Download movies to the app and watch offline.

🥇 SWEET.TV is the first Ukrainian service to sign direct contracts with Disney, Paramount, Universal, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Sony for Ukrainian territory, not for the CIS and Russian markets.

🎙 Unique agreements made it possible to create Ukrainian-language dubbing and voice acting for cult films within the framework of the “Hollywood in Ukrainian” project at our own expense. During the year of the project's existence, 180+ films, cartoons and TV series received the Ukrainian-language audio track.

Download the app and enjoy watching!

title:
SWEET.TV - TV and movies
2.18.0

creator: VAN Group
descriptionHtml:
🎉 Your Favourite Movies, TV Shows & Live TV in One Entertainment App



Looking for an all-in-one entertainment app with epic movies, trending TV shows, and your favourite channels like Disney, Sony, Paramount, and Universal? Welcome to SWEET.TV — the TV app that brings the cinema and more into your home. With over 200+ live TV channels, thousands of films and series, and premieres shortly after the big screen, SWEET.TV gives you everything you need to relax, enjoy, and stay entertained.

🎬 Watch HD Movies, TV Shows & Premieres Anytime


SWEET.TV is your go-to watch online app for movies, TV shows, and exclusive premieres. Access a growing collection of over 1,000 movies and films in Full HD — from action to animation. Whether you're watching solo or with family, our carefully curated catalogue ensures there's something for everyone. Plus, get early access to blockbusters from Disney, Sony, Paramount, and more, right after their cinema release.

📺 200+ Live TV Channels with Replay & Timeshift


Love live TV? SWEET.TV has you covered. Stream news, sports, kids’ channels, and entertainment — all in one simple TV app. Missed your favourite show? Catch up with 7-day replay or rewind with timeshift so you never miss a moment — or download your favorites to watch offline anytime. Whether you're into morning news or late-night comedy, your shows and favourite films are always within reach.

📱 Use SWEET.TV on Any Device


Turn your phone, tablet, laptop, or Smart TV into your personal cinema. This entertainment app lets you watch TV shows and films across 4 devices at once — with no extra charges. One subscription works across 3 different addresses, making it perfect for sharing with family and friends. Stream on Android TV, Samsung, LG, or any modern Smart TV.

💳 Try Your Entertainment App for Free


Not sure yet? The SWEET.TV app gives you a 7-day free trial. Cancel anytime — no contracts, no commitments. Simple as that.
Even without a subscription, you can still enjoy SWEET.TV. Selected content is available to watch for free with short ad breaks, and you can take advantage of special offers like trial access or temporarily open channels.

🍿 Tailored Recommendations Daily


Not sure what to watch? Our entertainment app offers daily picks to match your mood. Open the TV app and discover your next movie, series, or live TV show instantly. SWEET.TV keeps your evenings cosy and your weekends fun.

🎁 Why Choose SWEET.TV?


✔️ 1,000+ HD movies, films & animation
✔️ The latest TV shows and early-access premieres
✔️ Over 200 live TV channels with replay
✔️ Watch online app with flexible device support
✔️ One TV app to rule all your screens

SWEET.TV is more than a watch online app — it’s your daily dose of entertainment. Whether you want to watch HD movies with the family, binge TV shows on your phone, or unwind with live TV on your Smart TV, it’s all here.
Start your free trial today and make SWEET.TV your favourite entertainment app.
descriptionShort: TV streaming app with 200+ live TV channels, fresh releases & 7-day replay
